titles: The nonconformists vindication, or, A testimony given against the indulged assembly of separatists wherein the false calumnies and aspersions cast upon the suffering Presbyterians, are answered and confuted : also, the heads and causes of separation are opened and explained, together with an illustration of the Erastian state of the present church.
author: Grant, Patrick, 17th/18th cent.
notes: Attributed to Patrick Grant. Cf. BM.
